short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to accompany the SimpleIEP web app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the capability of the SimpleIEP webapp, a tool for helping teachers and educators with documentation.

To sign up for SimpleIEP, email us at hello@simple-iep.com.
